olapUnit.name: Profile_view
olapUnit.label: Profile view
olapUnit.mdxQuery: select {[Measures].[Duration in ms], [Measures].[Number of ops], [Measures].[SQL queries], [Measures].[MDX queries], [Measures].[Cache hits], [Measures].[Aggregate hits], [Measures].[Cache hit ratio], [Measures].[Agg hit ratio], [Measures].[Avg SQL queries per MDX query]} ON COLUMNS from [ProfilingCube]
